strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Game Patch Notes' / RPG inventory theme fits the retro pixel art aesthetic perfectly. It turns technical updates (API keys, bug fixes) into 'unlocked items' or 'quest rewards', making the content highly engaging and nostalgic for our Gen-Z dev audience.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art title screen. A cute chunky pixel bee character holding a glowing game cartridge labeled 'UPDATE'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Retro game UI frame with hearts for health. Warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'NEW ITEMS UNLOCKED'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
images.description: Title slide introducing the updates as game items.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art scene. An open pixelated spellbook on a wooden desk, emitting magical sparkles. A tiny pixel Discord logo floating above the page. Soft pastel colors, warm lamp lighting. Chunky sprites. Text in pixel font: 'Discord Bot Guide'. Wholesome RPG vibes.
images.description: Visualizing the Discord Bot Tutorial as a spellbook/guide.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art close-up. A golden pixelated key with a small hourglass next to it inside an inventory slot. Soft mint and peach gradient background. Retro UI style. Clean, wholesome vibes. Text in pixel font: 'Key Tracking & Expiry'.
images.description: Representing the API key expiration and tracking update.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art scene. A retro pixel radio sitting in soft lime green (#ecf874) grass with musical notes floating up. Seven tiny unique pixel birds (representing new voices) chirping around it. Warm sunlight, blue sky gradient. Text in pixel font: '7 New Voices'.
images.description: Showcasing the new audio voices with a nature metaphor.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art scene. A cute tiny pixel robot wizard fixing a glowing server block with a magic wand. Sparkles of magic. Soft pastel blue and purple background. Warm, friendly vibes. Text in pixel font: 'Gemini + GPT-5 Fixes'.
images.description: Combining the technical model fixes into a 'magic repair' visual.

caption:

alt_text: A carousel of cozy 8-bit pixel art images showing a cute bee character, a magical spellbook for discord tutorials, a pixel key with an hourglass, birds singing for audio updates, and a robot wizard fixing bugs. The style is warm, nostalgic, and uses lime green and pastel colors.
